name: Staffs Poker Society
summary:
This society was formed to allow people the chance to enjoy poker whether they are brand new or regulars to the game, we did this by creating a friendly environment where all are welcome to learn more while having fun. 
We run the weekly game in LRV on Thursday nights starting at 7:00 pm with late registration at around 7:30-8 pm to allow people to get there later.
The buy-in is £2.50 and all the money is put into the pot, in which the top 3 players will split the cash.
If you would like to 'Give it a Go!', please come down to one of our 'Weekly Poker Tournament' events.
Membership costs just £3 and gets you all of these great benefits!
-Regular invite to our regular Tuesday games.
-Be registered to play in our league.
-Invite to our Poker Chat.
-Invite to any society meets/larger tournaments.
-Able to play/read any new equipment our society purchases.

name: Rock, Alternative, Metal Society
summary:
Welcome to RAMS - Staffordshire University’s premiere group for all things Rock, Alternative & Metal! With us you will find a home amongst a family of likeminded charlatans and saints, all with the same driving love for music, drinking and merrymaking!
Only as a member of RAMS will you experience the alternative nightlife that Stoke has to offer in its full and wonderful glory, alongside people that will quickly become your closest friends and drinking buddies!
Hallmark sentiments aside, a membership with RAMS will also bring you a host of other benefits that will only serve to boost and heighten your student experience here at Staffs.
-Free or Discounted Entry to Stokes’ many Rock Events
-Free Entry to our very own TAKEOVER rock nights at the LRV & Verve
-Subsidised Day Trips and Society Products
-Discounted Travel for Group Gig Events here or in Manchester & Birmingham
-And much much more!

name: Game Development Society
summary:
Welcome to Staffordshire Universities Game Development Society. Voted 'Student Group of the Year' you’ll find a place with lots of passionate people geared towards the game industry!
-Meet once a week from 6pm - 9pm to make games with likeminded people.
-Go to gaming events such as EGX and Insomnia Gaming Festival at a discounted rate.
-Get critique and support for your projects and work during dev sessions and through our discord server with 600+ gaming students and Industry already registered.
-Guest speakers from the game industry.
-Take part in student-led challenges.
-Meet other students from a variety of fields in Game Development.

name: Staffordshire University Racing (SUR)
summary: Staffordshire Uni Racing are beginning the continuation of our project into the 6th year at the IMechE Formula Student Event. After an exhilirating win of 1st place in the First Year Vehicle Class at the Competition and an astonishing 2nd Overall in 2021 we are looking for more students to engage in this project. We hope you can help us to another year of success!\nBefore we proceed to the competition, we get the ball rolling at the Workshop where we plan and organise the year, design, manufacture and test the car ready for the nail-biting event.\nAlongside the building, designing and testing of the car we also have the static events in which we take part to increase our points at the compeition and so are also vital to our project. The business plan, costings and accompanying documents are also important tasks which fulfill the competition requirements.
